recipesJson.name: Ever WONDER About A Doughnut??
recipesJson.author: VapinTrucker
recipesJson.description:
Made For Fresh03 Live WONDER FLAVOR SHOW...WHAT FOLLOWS IS BASED OFF THE SHAKE..DONT KNOW HOW IT WILL STEEP...LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU THINK!!!

WOW...ALL I CAN SAY RIGHT NOW....WOW...MARVELOUS off the shake  PLEASE STEEP EVEN BETTER!!!

Nice cakey glazed donut with bavarian cream and a slight tobacco note on the end of the vqape...sweet sweet sweet!!
